name: Getting started with Groovy in Codenvy

steps.title: Open a terminal
steps.content: To start the terminal, go the the `Run` menu and select `Run`. You should see a console section starting up in the lower pane of the IDE - this is setting up a container with Groovy ready to go.

steps.title: Access the Terminal
steps.content: Every Codenvy runner has a terminal with root access.
